comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: Now that the Woman's Weekly has been digitised and is available on-line, some of these wedding pics can be dated a bit more precisely. This one involves the Meeks-Hordern wedding, February 1936 - nla.gov.au/nla.news-article17342840 Here's some info on the bridesmaids seen in this pic - nla.gov.au/nla.news-article46942769
